apecloud/myduckserver

Server for DuckDB with MySQL and Postgres protocols

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • GitHub repo for DuckDB, an in-process SQL database system for analytics
  • cloud-native storage engine for PostgreSQL with modern hardware support and reduced maintenance
  • integrated data lake and catalog format built on SQL and Parquet
  • Serverless peer-to-peer database using IPFS
  • MySQL-compatible distributed database for scalable apps
  • MySQL MCP server with SSH tunnel support
  • Fast Postgres data streaming with CDC
  • open source platform for building your own cloud
